summary: Most requested theme refresh is implemented: global beige/off-white + navy tokens, gradient accent utilities, updated navbar styling with smooth scrolling and active-section logic, and modernized card/shadow/rounding across sections. However, the diff introduces additional gradient usage beyond the allowed scope (hero-wide gradient overlays and a general card hover gradient utility) and adds an unrequested footer attribution link.

hallucinated_features.description: Hero uses full-section gradient overlay backgrounds (e.g., bg-gradient-to-b / bg-gradient-to-r) in addition to gradient shapes, which exceeds the constraint that gradients should be only for hero background shapes, CTA buttons, and highlight/stat cards.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-26 restricts gradient usage; these overlays are gradients used as general hero background layers, not just discrete background shapes.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a general-purpose card hover gradient effect utility (premium-card-border::before) that applies a linear-gradient background on hover, which can enable gradients on regular cards outside hero/highlight contexts.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-26 restricts gradients to hero shapes, CTA buttons, and highlight/stat cards; a generic card gradient utility is not requested and risks spreading gradients across the site.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a "caffeine.ai attribution link" in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and could be considered third-party branding/attribution beyond the specified theme/hero updates.
